intro: Impatiens anhuiensis, commonly known as the Anhui Impatiens, is a flowering plant native to China. It belongs to the Balsaminaceae family and is characterized by its strikingly colorful, spurred petals. The plant typically grows in moist, shaded environments, such as forest understories. It has opposite, ovate leaves with a smooth or slightly hairy surface. Its unique floral structure and vibrant colors make it a notable species in botanical studies.
